name: Alamo Splash
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the tequila, lime juice, orange juice and grenadine. Shake the cocktail shaker vigorously for about 10-15 seconds. Strain the mixture from the shaker into a glass. Top the cocktail with club soda. Optional: Garnish the glass with a lime wedge.

name: Red Hooter
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the vodka, cranberry juice, peach schnapps and orange juice. Close the shaker tightly and shake vigorously for about 10 seconds. Strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass. Optionally, garnish the cocktail with a slice of orange or a cherry.

name: Blushin' Russian
directions: Fill a short glass with ice. Pour over vodka, coffee liqueur and amaretto. Stir it with a cocktail stirrer or long-handled spoon. Pour over heavy cream. Stir the drink briskly and serve immediately.

name: Blue Margarita
directions: Optional: Rim the edge of a glass using lime juice and coarse salt. In a blender, combine tequila, lemonade, blue curaçao, and ice. Blend thoroughly until smooth. Pour mix into rimmed glass and insert a small beer bottle.

name: Cactus Berry
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the vodka, cranberry juice, lime juice and simple syrup. Close the shaker and shake vigorously for about 10 seconds. Strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice. Top off the glass with club soda. Optional: Garnish with fresh berries.

name: Blue Cloud Cocktail
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the vodka, blue curacao, lemon juice and simple syrup. Close the shaker and shake vigorously for about 10 seconds. Strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass. Add a splash of club soda to the glass.Optional: Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Blue Velvet
directions: Fill a shaker with ice. Add the vodka, blue curacao, lemon juice and simple syrup. Shake the mixture well and strain the cocktail into a chilled glass. Optional: Garnish with blueberries.

name: Catalina Margarita
directions: Add ice to shaking glass. Add the tequila, peach schnapps, sweet and sour and blue curacao. Shake well and strain over ice into margarita glass. Optional: Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Hairy Sunrise
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes. Add the vodka, peach schnapps, orange juice and grenadine. Close the cocktail shaker tightly and shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds to mix the ingredients thoroughly. Open the shaker and strain the cocktail into a glass.

name: Beer Buster
directions: Pour vodka into a highball glass, and fill with beer or ale. Add dashes of tabasco sauce, stir lightly, and serve.
ingredients: 8 oz of chilled beer or ale

name: Black Russian
directions: Add vodka and coffee liqueur into a mixing glass with ice and stir until well-chilled. Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.

name: Bull Frog
directions: Add ice to tall glass and pour clear liquors inside. Add lemon juice and drizzle blue curaçao over top. Top with red bull. Optional: Garnish with a lemon wedge and a cherry.

name: Cape Codder
directions: Add the vodka into a highball glass over ice. Top with cranberry juice and stir briefly to combine. Optional: Squeeze a lime wedge over the glass and drop it into the drink.

name: Alabama Fizz
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice. Add the rum, lemon juice, simple syrup and egg white. Close the shaker tightly and shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds. Open the shaker and strain the mixture into a glass. Fill the glass with club soda, leaving some space at the top. Stir gently to combine the ingredients.

name: Chelsea Sidecar
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes. Add the cognac, orange liqueur, lemon juice and simple syrup. Close the shaker tightly and shake vigorously for about 10 seconds. Strain the mixture into a chilled cocktail glass. Optional: Garnish the cocktail with a lemon twist.

name: Diamond Fizz
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the gin, lemon juice, simple syrup and egg white. Close the shaker tightly and shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds. Open the shaker and strain the mixture into a glass. Top the cocktail with club soda, leaving some space at the top of the glass. Optional: Garnish the drink with a lemon twist.

name: Canyon Quake
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the tequila, lime juice, orange juice, cranberry juice and agave nectar. Shake the cocktail shaker vigorously for about 10-15 seconds and strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice. Optional: Garnish the cocktail with a lime wedge.

name: Cranberry Cooler
directions: Fill a highball glass with ice. Add the vodka, cranberry juice, orange juice and top with lemon-lime soda. Stir gently to combine. Optional: Garnish with an orange slice and a lime wedge.

name: Hot Pants
directions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing tin and shake with ice. Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube. Optional: Garnish with grapefruit twist.
ingredients: 1/2 oz of mint tea simple syrup

name: Margarita
directions: Freeze the glass for 10-15 minutes until well-chilled. Or fill it with ice water. Half-fill a cocktail shaker with ice, then add the tequila, triple sec, and lime juice. Shake for 20 seconds. Take the glass out of the freezer or discard the ice water. Optional: Pour the salt onto a small plate or saucer. Run a lime wedge around the rim of the chilled glass, then dip the top into the salt. Fill the glass with fresh ice and strain the drink into the glass.

name: Citronella Cooler
directions: Fill a collins glass with ice. Pour over vodka, lime juice, lemonade, and cranberry juice and stir. Optional: Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Crocodile Cooler
directions: Fill a glass with ice. Add the melon liqueur, vodka, sour mix and top with lemon-lime soda. Optional: Garnish with a lime slice and a cherry.

name: Desert Sunrise
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes. Add the tequila, orange juice and grenadine. Close the shaker tightly with its lid. Shake the shaker vigorously for about 10-15 seconds to mix the ingredients thoroughly. Open the shaker and strain the cocktail into a glass.

name: Electric Jam
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes. Add the vodka, blue curacao, lemon juice and simple syrup. Close the shaker tightly and shake vigorously for about 10 seconds. Place a strainer on top of a glass. Pour the mixture from the shaker into the glass, using the strainer to catch any ice cubes.

name: Dry Martini
directions: Add the gin, dry vermouth, and orange bitters into a mixing glass with ice and stir until very cold. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Optional: Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Fallen Angel
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes. Add the dark rum, lime juice, pineapple juice, orange juice and grenadine. Close the cocktail shaker tightly and shake vigorously for about 10-15 seconds. Prepare a cocktail glass by filling it with ice cubes. Strain the shaken mixture into the prepared cocktail glass. Optional: Garnish the cocktail with a lime wedge or pineapple slice.

name: Floradora Cooler
directions:
Add the gin, lime juice and raspberry syrup into a shaker with ice and shake until well-chilled. Double-strain into a highball glass over fresh ice. Top with the ginger beer (or ginger ale) and stir gently and briefly to combine. Optional: Garnish with skewered raspberries.

Raspberry syrup: In a bowl or other large container, muddle a 12-ounce pack of frozen raspberries and 3 cups simple syrup. Let stand for 12 hours, then strain out and discard solids. The syrup will keep, refrigerated and tightly sealed, for up to one week.
ingredients: 1 splash of ginger beer or ginger ale

name: Gin Sour
directions: Add the gin, lemon juice, syrup, and egg white to a cocktail shaker without ice. Shake for 15 seconds. Add the ice to the cocktail shaker. Shake again for 30 seconds. Strain the drink into a glass; the foam will collect at the top. Serve with or without ice. Optional: Garnish with bitters swirled into foam and lemon twist.

name: Citron Neon
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes. Add the vodka, blue curacao, lemon juice and simple syrup. Close the cocktail shaker tightly with its lid. 7. Shake the shaker vigorously for about 10-15 seconds to mix the ingredients and chill the cocktail. Open the shaker and strain the cocktail into a chilled glass. Optional: Garnish the cocktail with a lemon twist or a slice of lemon.

name: Mexican Madras
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the tequila, cranberry juice, orange juice, lime juice and simple syrup. Close the shaker tightly and shake vigorously for about 10 seconds. Take a glass and fill it with ice cubes. Strain the cocktail mixture from the shaker into the glass. Optional: Garnish the cocktail with a lime wedge on the rim of the glass.

name: Purple Pancho
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes. Add the tequila, lime juice, grapefruit juice, agave syrup and triple sec. Close the cocktail shaker tightly with its lid. Shake the shaker vigorously for about 10-15 seconds to mix the ingredients thoroughly. Open the shaker and strain the cocktail into a glass.

name: Handball Cooler
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes. Add the vodka, blue curacao, lime juice and simple syrup. Close the shaker tightly and shake vigorously for about 10 seconds. Fill a glass with ice cubes. Strain the contents of the shaker into the glass. Top off the glass with lemon-lime soda. Stir gently to combine all the ingredients.

name: Harvey Wallbanger
directions: Fill a tall glass with ice, then add the vodka and orange juice and stir. Float the Galliano on top. Optional: Garnish with a skewered orange slice and maraschino cherry.

name: Long Island Iced Tea
directions: Add the vodka, rum, tequila, gin, triple sec, simple syrup and lemon juice to a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with a splash of the cola and stir briefly. Optional: Garnish with a lemon wedge.

name: Pink Lemonade
directions: Pour ingredients over crushed ice in glass. Stir and serve.

name: Fog Horn
directions: Pour the gin and lime juice into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass. Stir well and top with ginger beer or ginger ale. Optional: Garnish with a lime wedge. Serve and enjoy.
ingredients: 4 oz of ginger beer or ginger ale

name: Gin and sin
directions: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, pour the gin, lemon juice, orange juice, and grenadine. Shake well. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Optional: Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Rum Runner
directions: Add the light rum, navy-strength rum, banana liqueur, blackberry liqueur, pineapple juice, lime juice and grenadine into a shaker with ice and shake until well-chilled. Strain into a hurricane glass filled with crushed ice. Optional: Garnish with a skewered brandied cherry and pineapple wedge.

name: Frozen Daiquiri
directions:
Serves 2

Add all ingredients into a blender with a cup and a half of ice. Pulse until mixed. Divide between two coupes or Margarita glasses and garnish each with a lime wheel.

name: Fuzzy Navel
directions: Add the peach schnapps and orange juice into a highball glass over ice, and stir briefly to combine. Optional: Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Silk Stockings
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes. Add the gin, apricot brandy, heavy cream, orange juice and grenadine. Close the cocktail shaker tightly with its lid. Shake the shaker vigorously for about 10-15 seconds to mix the ingredients thoroughly. Open the shaker and strain the cocktail into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Tijuana Taxi
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes. Add the tequila, lime juice, orange juice, pineapple juice and grenadine. Close the cocktail shaker tightly. Shake the shaker vigorously for about 10-15 seconds to mix the ingredients thoroughly. Open the shaker and strain the cocktail into a glass.

name: Affair
directions: Pour the strawberry liqueur, orange juice, cranberry juice and top with club soda into a collins glass filled with ice. Optional: Garnish with an orange slice and a strawberry.

name: B-52
directions: Pour the coffee liqueur into a shot glass. Slowly layer the irish cream liqueur on top of the coffee liqueur and the Grand Marnier on top of the irish cream liqueur.

name: Between The Sheets
directions: Add the cognac, rum, triple sec and lemon juice into a shaker with ice and shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

name: Buzzard's Breath
directions: Vigorously shake the amaretto, coffee liqueur and peppermint schnapps and pour into a shot glass.

name: C. C. Kazi
directions:
Makes three servings.

Shake with ice and strain into Shot glass.

name: Galactic Ale
directions: Shake the vodka, blue curacao, crème de cassis and the lime juice with ice. Strain into a shot glass.

name: Green Demon
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add the vodka, melon liqueur, lemon juice, simple syrup and pineapple juice. Shake the mixture vigorously for about 10-15 seconds. Strain the cocktail into a glass filled with fresh ice. Top off the glass with a splash of soda water. Optional: Garnish the cocktail with a lime wedge.

name: Johnny On The Beach
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice cubes. Add the rum, peach schnapps, orange juice, cranberry juice and grenadine

name: Kamikaze
directions: Add the vodka, orange liqueur and lime juice to a shaker with ice, and shake thoroughly until well-chilled. Strain into two shot glasses.

name: Lemon Drop
directions: To a shaker filled with ice, add the vodka, lime juice and simple syrup. Shake until icy cold. Strain into a shot glass rimmed with sugar. Garnish with a lemon slice and enjoy!

name: Parisian Blonde
directions: Add the rum, curaçao and cream into a shaker with ice and shake until well-chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with freshly grated nutmeg.

name: Purple Hooter
directions: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Pour all ingredients into the shaker. Shake well for about 15 seconds. Strain and pour into a chilled shot glass.

name: Rocky Mountain
directions: Combine vodka, vermouth, yellow chartreuse, and bitters in a mixing glass. Add ice, and stir until well combined, about 10 seconds. Strain into a chilled Nick and Nora glass, and garnish with an orange peel strip.

name: Sex On The Beach
directions: Grab a hurricane glass and fill it with ice. To achieve that gorgeous sunset hue, pour the vodka, schnapps, and orange juice in first. Top with the cranberry juice. Garnish with an orange slice and cherry, or any tropical fruit you have at home.

name: Sour Apple Martini
directions: Add the apple liqueur, vodka, lime juice & simple syrup into a cocktail shaker with ice cubes. Shake well to chill. Strain and pour into a martini glass.

name: Woo Woo
directions: Add the vodka, peach schnapps and cranberry juice into a highball glass filled with ice and stir briefly to combine. Garnish with a lime wedge.
